name: Challenge Accepted
description:
Hi there , this is a compo solo work for Ludum Dare 47.

It's a visual novel about a reality quiz show for hardcore player. 

I made this game because I found out that nowadays player like to call whatever hard game "hardcore" and spend more and more time on just aimless practicing. And I really doubt the reasonability of this atmosphere. Is hard game a good game? Or, should game only serves what called "hardcore players"?

In that case why not let them be trapped in the endless "hardcore game"?

Please ignore the grammar or typo errors, I am not that good in English>m<.
